In her communal bank, she is an active member, in accordance with the group's agreement. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, she will be able to buy medicines such as pills, syrups, vials, etc, and in this way, she will open her own pharmacy.

loans.use: purchase pills, syrups, and vials to establish her own pharmacy.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina, de 43 años, es una mujer trabajadora y responsable, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Cesar de 45 años y sus 05 queridos hijos a quienes desea brinda una mejor calidad de vida. Alejandrina, es una mujer perseverante y luchadora, se dedica a la venta de Agroquímicos; gracias al esfuerzo de seguir adelante, hoy, cuenta con su negocio donde atiende con mucha alegría para los pobladores de la comunidad de Roca, un pueblo alejado de la ciudad de Kimbiri; Alejandrina, logra vender sus productos químicos a los agricultores que siempre están al tanto de sus cultivos y piden consejo a la señora Alejandrina para que les apoye como poder mantener sanos sus siembras. Sin embargo le consta que también hay dificultades al no poder tener los fertilizantes agroquímicos. Por ende acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo y de esa forma pueda abastecerse de sus productos. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, se compromete a pagar de forma puntual sus cuotas, para que en otra oportunidad logre acceder a otro. En su banco comunal es una socia alegre y responsable.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará insecticidas, funguicidas, abonos, entre otros.
texts.en:
Alejandrina, 43 years old, is a hardworking and responsible woman. She lives in her own home with her husband, Cesar, who is 45 years old, and their 5 beloved children. She wishes to provide them with a better quality of life.

Alejandrina is a determined and persevering woman. She makes a living selling agrochemicals. Due to her efforts to move forward, today she has her business, where she cheerfully serves the residents of the Roca community, a town away from the city of Kimbiri. Alejandrina sells her chemicals to farmers who are concerned with their crops and who seek advice from her to learn how to keep their plantings healthy.However, she knows that there are difficulties when she can't supply the agrochemical fertilizers. Thus, she come to MFP to apply for a loan and thereby she can stock her products. 

This will be her first loan with MFP. She agrees to pay her dues in a timely manner so that in time she can have the opportunity to take out another loan. In her community bank, she is a cheerful and responsible partner. With the 1000 nuevos soles (local currency), she will buy insecticides, fungicides, and fertilizer, among others.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides, fungicides, and fertilizer

loans.name: Sabran's Group

texts.en:
Sabran has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her grocery-store business. She will utilize the loan in her business and purchase salt, spices and other grocery items in bulk quantities that will allow her to fulfill the clients' needs and increase her sales and profits.

She is very experienced in her work and has been operating it for many years. She is confident that her business will have more success after investing the loan.

She is also a great wife and mother. Her family is very happy with her management abilities. She is confident that her family’s living conditions will be improved after investing the loan in her business.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Sabran.

loans.use: To buy grocery items like spices, cooking oils, etc., for the grocery-selling business.

loans.name: Kalsoom's Group

texts.en:
Kalsoom is a great mother. She has given birth to a son and 4 daughters. Her eldest son and elder daughter work to financially contribute to the family. Kalsoom has worked very hard throughout her life to raise her children. 
She herself is also a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very creative in her work and makes beautiful looking clothes for her clients and charges very reasonable rates.
She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah to purchase a new sewing machine for the improvement of her business. By doing that, she will be able to fulfill client orders on time and increase her profits.
She is an experienced working lady and has been operating her business for many years. She is confident that her business will be improved further by investing the funds from the loan.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Kalsoom.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Mbuvi

texts.en: Mbuvi is 40 years old, married with 5 children. He does kale farming to earn a living. He has been in the business for 6 years and has employed two people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy fertilizer and kale seeds.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and kale seeds

loans.name: Hajraan

texts.en:
Hajraan has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s mobile items shop. He is an expert in mobile repairing and his customers trust his repairing skills very much. 
With the loan investment, he will buy mobile repairing tools, accessories, new and used mobiles for selling through his shop.
Hajraan is very confident that her husband will be able to improve his business successfully by utilizing the loan in a positive way.
Hajraan is an embroidery expert and prepares precious embroidered clothes for her clients.
She has given birth to 7 children. 3 of them work and 3 are studying while her youngest son is only 3 years old and hasn’t started his education yet.
Hajraan is very hopeful about her family’s better financial future as a result of her husband’s business improvement.

loans.use: To buy mobile phones, accessories, and repairing tools for mobile items shop.

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is a sewing expert. She is very artistic and prepares beautiful looking clothes for her community clients and earns regular income every month.
She has given birth to 2 sons and a daughter. All of them are continuing their education by attending a nearby school.
She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for further improvement of her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to complete the orders in a shorter period of time and increase her profits.
She is very experienced in her work and has been operating her business for many years. She is confident that her business will become more profitable after investing the loan funds.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Naseem.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 44 years old, married with 3 children. He does quarrying to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed two people. He does maize farming to earn extra income. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standard and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to rent land for quarrying and quarrying tools.

loans.use: To rent land for quarrying and buy quarrying tools

loans.name: Sope Serign Babacar Group

texts.fr:
Arame est une femme mariée âgée de 34 ans et mère de 5 enfants .
Elle est  membre du BV depuis son inauguration et fait parti du groupe de solidarité Sope Serign Babacar.
Le dit groupe a été crée depuis le premier cycle du BV et regroupe 7 membres du même village ayant de valeurs sociales communes.
Arame debout à gauche de la photo est responsable de son groupe .Elle fait du commerce dans la vente de de poissons  séchés et fumés .
Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine pour l'avoir pratiqué pendant plusieurs années. 
Avec son nouveau crédit de 200 000 francs CFA elle va acheter 10 paniers de poissons fumés et 5 de poissons séchés qu'elle va revendre au niveau de son village.
Avec ses bénéfices elle va payer du riz de l'huile et du sucre pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Arame is a 34-year-old woman.  She is married and the mother of 5 children.

She has been a member of the BV (Banc Villageois) since its inception and is a member of the Sope Serign Babacar solidarity group. This group has been in existence since the first cycle of the BV, and consists of 7 members from the same village who share common social values.  Arame, standing at the far left in the photo, is the group's representative.  She sells dried and smoked fish.  She has a good experience in this field, since she has been involved in this activity for several years.

With her new loan of 200,000 CFA francs, she will buy 10 baskets of smoked fish and 5 baskets of dried fish, which she will resell in her village.

With the profits, she will buy rice, oil and sugar for her family.

loans.use: to buy smoked and dried fish.

loans.name: Rasheeda's Group

texts.en:
Rasheeda is married and the mother of five children. All of them do different kinds of work to contribute financially to the family.

Rasheeda also sews clothes for her community clients. She receives regular orders every month due to her good quality work. Her husband operates a horse cart and provides loading and transportation services to his customers.

Rasheeda has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband, who will buy a young horse for the improvement of his business. This will help him to provide better quality loading and transport services to his customers, and to increase his profits.

He is very experienced in his business and Rasheeda is confident that his business will be further improved after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy a horse for a transport and loading business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 36 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Félix de 50 años y sus 04 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Elizabeth, es una mujer alegre y luchadora, se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia; hace 25 años que se dedica al labrar la tierra para después cultivar plantas de café. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, hijos y de algunos jornaleros quienes le ayudan a extraer los frutos de manera rápida. Para después llevarlas a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, donde se encuentran lo centros de acopio que le remuneran buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo de café. Por lo tanto lo que prioriza ahora es poder sembrar plantas de cacao para que pueda incrementar en su parcela. Este será su crédito número 10 con MFP, sabe que tiene que ser puntual con las cuotas de pago para que en otra oportunidad pueda acceder a otra solicitud de préstamo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy activa y responsable.
Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 36 years-old, lives in her home with her husband Félix who's 50 years-old and their 4 beloved children to whom she wishes to give a better quality of life. Elizabeth is a happy and determined woman who worries about the well-being of her family. She's been making a living working the land to then grow coffee plants for 25 years. During harvest times, she relies on the support of her husband, children, and some day laborers to help her extract the fruits quickly to then take them to sell in the city of San Francisco where the warehouses are located that pay her well for each kilogram of coffee. Therefore now her priority is to be able to cultivate cocoa plants so that she can increase her land. This will be her tenth loan with MFP. She knows that she has to be punctual with her payments so that she will be able to access another loan request at another time. She is a very active and responsible member of her communal bank.

She will buy coffee plants with the 2,500 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Elva, de 25 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Sergio de 28 años y su pequeña hija Linda de 06 años, a quien desean una buena estadía. Elva, una mujer de provecho dedicada a su trabajo en los campos de cultivo donde le dedica suficiente cuidado a su siembra de café; ya que su familia depende de la obtención de sus frutos. Lo que mas le gusta de trabajo es poder realizar junto a su esposo e hijos quienes le dan moción para seguir adelante con la obtención de las  plantas de café, a la vez considera difícil sobre las breñas que llegan crecen en medio de las plantas de sus sembradíos. Hasta ahora cuenta con el apoyo de los financistas de MFP ya que ellos apoyan la manera como trabaja Elva en su campo de cultivo. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP, y será muy responsable como siempre, además está conforme con el trabajo de su banco comunal porque son personas responsables.
Con los 500 nuevos soles, comprará abono para cuidar sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Elva, 25 years-old, lives in her home with her partner Sergio who's 28 years-old and their young daughter Linda who's 6 years-old and to whom they want to give a good life.

Elva is a hardworking woman who's dedicated to her work in the fields where she devotes care to her coffee crop since her family depends on obtaining its fruits. What she likes most about her work is to be able to do it with her husband and children who give her the energy to continue forward with what they obtain from the coffee plants. At the same time she considers the land with undergrowth that grow in between the plants of her sown field difficult. Until now she relies on the support of the financiers of MFP since they support the way she works in her fields. This will be her fourth loan with MFP and she will be very responsible as always. Moreover she is satisfied with the work of her communal bank because they are responsible people.

With the 500 nuevos soles she will buy fertilizer to take care of her fields.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Elver

texts.es:
Elver, es un hombre muy laborioso, tiene 25 años de edad, vive en su propia casa junto a su  pareja  y su querido hijo Jairo de 04 años. Elver, es un joven de provecho se dedica a labrar la tierra para luego sembrar plantas de café, actividad que realiza hace mas de 10 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus vecinos; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos parar luego ser compradas en las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le pagan buena ganancia por cada kilogramo de café que llega a venderlas. De la misma  forma que le resulta difícil transportar sus sacos de cosecha desde su chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicado en la ciudad de San Francisco. Para mas adelante prioriza en comprar nuevas tierras. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y está muy agradecido por haberle apoyado con reiterados créditos, ya que para él fueron de gran apoyo para que siga trabajando.
Con los 500 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café para sembrar en su parcela.
texts.en:
Elver is a very hardworking man. He's 25 years-old and lives in his home with his partner and their beloved son Jairo who's 4 years-old. Elver is a hardworking young adult who makes a living working the land to then plant coffee plants, an activity he's been doing for more than 10 years. During harvest times he relies on the support of his neighbors. In this way he quickly extracts the fruits to then be sold in the warehouses where they pay him a good earning for each kilogram of coffee that he sells them. In this same way it is difficult for him to transport his sacks of harvest from his small farm to the warehouses located in the city of San Francisco. In the future he prioritizes buying new land. This will be his third loan with MFP and he is very grateful that they have helped him with repeated loans since they were a great support for him so that he could keep working.

With the 500 nuevos soles he will be buy coffee plants to grow in his lot.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 34 years old and married with three children. 

She runs a grocery store to earn a living. She has been in this business for 13 years and describes her business environment as competitive because many people are in the same business. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 70,000 Kenya Shillings to buy tomatoes, potatoes and onions to sell.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes and onions to sell.

loans.name: Nhor's Group

texts.en:
Nhor is a 61-year-old father of three children, two of whom are still dependent.  He earns a living through cultivating rice and plantain as his main source of income.  Having been in this business for almost 30 years, he manages to earn US $3 per day and saves only US $1 each day. 

Nhor has been with VisionFund for several years and has completely paid back his previous loan.  The previous loan helped him afford to renovate his home into a decent house.  Now he is requesting a loan with his group member. He will use this loan to buy fertilizer for his farmland.  He hopes to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Eudosia

texts.es: Eudosia, de 27 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su pequeña y estimada hija Jocelyn de 10 años, a quien dedica todos sus esfuerzos. Eudosia, gracias a todos sus esfuerzos, hoy tiene su negocio de  abarrotes, donde le va de la mejor manera, además sus ventas vienen mejorando con respecto a los anteriores, a pesar de ello trata de mejorar su tienda de abarrotes con la necesidad de que pueda atraer clientes. Eudosia trabaja por cuenta propia en su tienda, ubicada en la localidad de Roca un pueblo donde no hay mucha competencia con los negocios. Su plan a futuro es tener comprar productos de abarrotes para incrementar en su tiendo y de esa forma surtir sus productos. Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además esta conforme con su banco comunal, ya que todos son solidarios. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará mercaderías con el propósito de que pueda abastecer su negocio de abarrotes.
texts.en: Eudosia, 27 years old, lives in her own house along with her small and esteemed daughter, Jocelyn, 10, to whom she dedicates all of her efforts. Eudosia, thanks to all of her effort, today has a grocery business, which is going the best way, and, in addition, her sales are improving compared to previous ones. Despite this, she tries to improve her grocery store with the need of being able to attract customers. Eudosia works on her own in the store, located in the town of Roca, a town where there is not a lot of competition among businesses. Her plan for the future is to buy grocery products to increase in her store and, in this way, stock her products. This will be her sixth loan with MFP, for which she promises to continue making her payments on time. In addition, this conforms with her community bank since all of them are united. With the 1,000 new "soles", she will buy merchandise with the purpose that she can stock her grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase products to stock her shop.

loans.name: Chuija Group

texts.es: La señora Magdalena es casada, tiene 37 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos 1 de los cuales esta estudiando, se dedica ala producción de ponchos,
texts.en: Magdalena is married and is 37 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study. She has four children, one of whom is studying. She is dedicated to making ponchos.

loans.use: to purchase fabric to make ponchos.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa, de 44 años, es una mujer laboriosa, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Víctor, de 46 años y sus 05 amados hijos, quienes apoyan a su linda madre por seguir adelante. Hace 20 años que la señora Luisa, se dedica a la siembra de plantas de café; actividad que realiza con mucho esfuerzo y de este modo pueda tener buena producción en los tiempos de cosecha; Luisa junto a sus esposo y sus hijos se dirigen desde tempranas horas a ver el crecimiento de sus plantas como también realizan el mantenimiento. Por otra parte, lo que más anhela es incrementar su siembra ya que son muy rentables al vender sus frutos. Es por ello que acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo que le brinde la ayuda de poder mantener productivas su siembra. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP, esta dispuesta a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago; asimismo, en su banco comunal es una socia solidaria y responsable. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar abono, fungicidas; para realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas de café.
texts.en: Luisa, 44 years old, is a hard-working woman. She lives in her own house along with her husband, Victor, 46, and their 5 dear children who support their beautiful mother to get ahead. For 20 years Luisa has been dedicated to planting coffee plants, an activity that she performs with a lot of effort. In this way, she can have good production at harvest time. Luisa, along with her husband and their children, leave at early hours to see the growth of their plans as well as to conduct maintenance. Moreover, what she longs for the most is to increase her planting since it is very profitable to sell the fruit. It is for this that she approached MFP to request a loan that provides the help to be able to maintain the products of her planting. This will be her fourth loan with MFP. She is ready to be punctual with her payments. At the same time, in her community bank, she is a responsible and united member. With the 2,000 new "soles" she will be able to buy fertilizer, fungicide to maintain her coffee plants.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and fungicide.

loans.name: Gervasio

texts.es:
Gervasio, de 47 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa, Silvestre de 41 años y sus 03 queridos hijos; Tulio de 20 años, Karina de 15 años y Lucy de 07 años, quienes apoyan a sus padres por el gran esfuerzo que hacen por salir adelante. Gervasio, es un hombre de bien, se dedica al cultivo de café, cuyos frutos le brindan buenas ganancias en los tiempos de cosecha, Gervasio, comenta que gracias al esfuerzo que día a día esta desempeñando, hoy tiene varias hectáreas de café cultivado. Sin embargo le resulta difícil transportar sus sacos de cosecha desde la chacra hasta  los centros de acopio. Pero ahora lo mas prevalece es comprar plantas de café para ampliar la siembra y de esa manera aumentar su producción y por ende obtener una buena estabilidad económica. 
Este será su crédito número 08 con MFP, esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito mas adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy puntual.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen a sacar las malezas que aquejan sus plantas.
texts.en: Gervasio, 47, lives in his own house along with his wife, Silvestre, 41, and their three dear children: Tulio 20, Karina 15, and Lucy 7, who support their parents for the great effort they make to get ahead. Gervasio is a good man who is dedicated to growing coffee, whose fruits provide good earnings at harvest time. Gervasio notes that, thanks to the effort that he puts forth day after day, today he has various hectares of grown coffee. Nevertheless, it is difficult to transport his harvest sacks from the farm to the collection centers. But now what prevails the most is to buy coffee plants to expand his planting and, in this way, expand production and obtain good economic stability. This will be his eighth loan with MFP. He is ready to pay all of his payments punctually since he wishes to request another loan in the future. In his community bank, he is a very punctual member. With the 1,000 new "soles", he will hire workers to support him in removing the weeds that plague his plants.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: Horacio

texts.es: Horacio es  un hombre muy laborioso y responsable, tiene 38 años, vive en su casa muy lejana, lugar muy apropiado para su actividad que realiza. Horacio, es un hombre de lucro que brinda esmero sembrar  plantaciones de café, actividad que realiza hace mas de 20 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros, de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos para luego venderlas en los centros de acopio, quienes le gratifican buena ganancia por cada kilogramo de café. Horacio, es un joven que también apoya  a su hermano con los gastos de su estudio que gracias a su ayuda podrá tener su titulo profesional que a Horacio le hubiera gustado tener. Ahora lo que prioriza es poder realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas es decir abonando sus plantones  ya que de la misma manera pueda tener buenos resultado en sus próximas cosechas. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y está muy contento por los resultado de sus inversiones y por la responsabilidad de sus compañeras de su grupo solidario,  por eso es muy responsable en sus pagos. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, ayudará con los gastos educativos de su hermano.
texts.en: Horacio is a very hard-working and responsible man. He is 38 years old and lives in his house very far away, very appropriate for the work he performs. Horacio is a man of benefit who provides care to coffee plants, an activity that he has done for more than 20 years. During harvest times, he has the support of workers, and in this way he quickly extracts the fruits to later sell in the collection centers where he is gratified by the good earnings for every kilogram of coffee. Horacio is a young man who also supports his brother with his educational expenses who, thanks to his support, will be able to have a professional title that Horacio would have liked to have. Now, what he has prioritized is to be able to maintain his plants, fertilizing his plants since  in this way he can have a good result for the next harvest. This will be his third loan with MFP and he is very happy with the results of his investments and with the responsibility of his colleagues in his group. For this, he is very responsible with his repayments. With the 2,000 new "soles" he will help with this brother's educational expenses.

loans.use: to purchase educational material for his brother.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel, de 29 años vive junto a su pareja Mario de 38 años y sus 02 queridos hijos; Gaby de 10 años y Eliana de 05 años quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Isabel, tiene mucho conocimiento sobre la agricultura que gracias a sus padres que le inculcaron desde pequeña hoy, tiene su propio campo de cultivo con hermosas plantas de café y los frutos bien robustos; esta actividad lleva realizando hace 18 años y considera que lo mas difícil es tener que transportar sus sacos de cosecha a los centro de acopio ubicada en la ciudad de San Francisco. Isabel, menciona, que le resulta fácil tener productivas las plantas de café gracias al esfuerzo que dedica a sus plantaciones; es por ello que acude a los préstamos de MFP para completar sus planes de trabajo. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, se compromete a pagar puntual todas las cuotas para que en otra oportunidad logre acceder a otra. En su banco comunal es una socia solidaria. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en la cosecha de su café.
texts.en: Isabel, 29, lives with her partner, Mario who is 28 years old, and their two dear children: Gaby 10 and Eliana 5, who are the main motivation for all of their efforts. Isabel has a lot of knowledge around agriculture thanks to her parents who taught her when she was young. Today, she has her own farm with beautiful coffee plants and robust fruit. She has been performing this work for 18 years and considers the most difficult part is to have to transport her harvest bags to the collection center located in the city of San Francisco. Isabel mentions that it is easy for her to have productive coffee plants thanks to the effort she dedicates to her farm. It is for this that she has requested a loan from MFP to complete her work plans. This will be her second loan with MFP. She promises to make all her payments punctually so that, at another opportunity, she can obtain another loan. In her community bank, she is a loyal member. With the 1,000 new "soles" she will hire workers to support her with the harvest of her coffee.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: Josue

texts.es:
Josue, de 32 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa Áurea de 29 años y su pequeño hijo Edin de 07 años; a quien desean brindar una buena estadía. Josue, es un hombre de lucro, se dedica al cultivo de café; durante 15 años realiza esta actividad que gracias a ello pudo obtener su propia casa. 
Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver sus plantas muy productivas después del arduo esfuerzo que da de su persona y considera difícil que los tiempos de lluvia, porque aparecen plagas que afectan sus plantones; sin embargo el no deja de luchar por tener otro terreno con cultivos de café. Su plan a futuro es poder tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. Este será su crédito número 08 con MFP, por el cual se compromete a ser puntual con  sus pagos. En su banco es un socio cabal. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará un terreno para incrementar sus plantas.
texts.en:
Josue, 32, lives in his own house with his wife, Áurea, 29, and their small son, Edin, 7, for whom they want the best.  Josue grows coffee for a living and has been in this business for 15 years, allowing him to buy his own home.  What he enjoys most about his work is seeing a productive crop after all the hard work he puts into it.  He feels the rainy season is difficult because afterwards crop disease appears.  But he is still striving to obtain another patch of land to grow coffee, since he wants to improve his family's quality of life in the future.

This will be his eighth loan through MFP and he is committed to paying it back on time.  He is a responsible member of his communal bank.  He plans to use the 2,000 PEN loan to buy land to increase crop production.

loans.use: To buy farm land.

loans.name: Elbis

texts.es:
Elbis de 47 años está casado con Angélica con quien tiene 6 hijos cuyas edades oscilan entre 22 y 7 años. Ahora solo vive con 4 de ellos, en una casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa Inchatingari, provincia de Chanchamayo. Elbis trabaja en el campo. En sus 2 parcelas de terrenos siembra café y achiote. Hace 20 años que Elbis se dirige constantemente hacia Camona, una localidad de comercio de su distrito, ahí expende sus productos. 
En todo ese tiempo, pudo darse cuenta que sus ventas son más beneficiosas si son al por mayor. 
“Vender por kilos no me conviene porque se malogran los frutos”, dice; por esa razón aumentó su producción en 5 años para ofrecerlo por sacos de 50 kilos.
Cada año cosecha entre 700 y 1000 kilos de café, los que hace secar y ofrece en Camona. Ahí ya lo conocen por eso no dudan en adquirir sus productos.
El trabajo del campo es cansado y se invierte mucho dinero y tiempo, pero él ya sabe como funciona el negocio y no se queja cuando tiene que caminar largas distancias y cargar pesados sacos para trasladar sus productos.
Tiene la esperanza, de que, con los años, pueda adquirir un carro usado, para trasladarse con mayor facilidad.
Éste sería su crédito número 3 que espera obtener de MFP. Por eso da su palabra de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. EL trabajo en grupo es lo más le gusta, porque puede reírse y conversar con sus compañeros, “Productores Inchatingari”, es el nombre de su banco comunal y se siente cómodo de ser parte de él.
Invertirá el dinero de su préstamo en la compra de plantitas de café, para ampliar su producción. Además pagará a los peones que apoyarán en esta cansada labor.
texts.en:
47-year-old Elbis is married to Angelica, with whom he has 5 children who are between the ages of 22 and 7 years old. Now he only lives with 4 of them, in their own house located in the native community of Inchatingari, Chanchamayo province. Elbis works in the fields. In his two parcels of land he sows coffee and achiote. For 20 years Elbis has been going constantly to Camona, a commercial town in his district where he sells his products. 
Over the years, he realized that his sales are more profitable if they are wholesale. “Selling by kilos is not in my interest since it ruins the fruit,” he says. For this reasons he increased his production over 5 years in order to offer sacks of 50 kilos. Each year, he harvest between 700 and 1000 kilos of coffee, which he dries and sells in Camona. There, they already know him, so they do not hesitate to buy his products.
Working in the field is tiring and requires a large investment of money and time, but he already knows how this business works and he does not complain when he has to walk long distances and carry heavy sacks to transport his products. He has hope that, over time, he will be able to acquire a used car to move around more easily.
This will be the third loan that he hopes to obtain from MFP. For this reasons, he gives his word that he will be punctual with his loan payments. He likes the group work, because he can laugh and converse with his colleagues. “Productores Inchatingari” (Inchatingari Producers) is the name of his communal bank and he feels comfortable being part of it. 
He will invest the money from the loan in the purchase of coffee plants to increase his production, in addition to paying the workers that support this tiring labor.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and hire laborers.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel, es una distinguida cultivadora, tiene 31 años de edad, trabaja para poder establecer una mejor calidad de vida y gracias a su esfuerzo hoy tiene  su propia casa. Es una mujer de trabajo. En los tiempos de lluvia su labor esta en su hogar, en la que le dedica todo su tiempo a sus labores domesticas. En la actividad  del cultivo lleva 15 años; y siente cosechar parte de su esfuerzo después del arduo sacrificio. Es muy amigable y conversadora, el cultivo  es lo que mejor sabe hacer, por ello aprovecha todas las oportunidades de poder estar siempre en su chacra, ya que sólo de ese modo ayuda en solventar sus propios gastos. En el futuro anhela tener una moto para que pueda movilizarse muy rápido a sus campos de cultivo. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, ratifica su compromiso de pagar, ya que su anhelo es de seguir trabajando responsablemente para surgir en la vida.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará una moto para que pueda trabajar con ella.
texts.en:
Maribel, 31, is a distinguished crop farmer who works hard to have a better quality of life, and thanks to her efforts she now has her own home.  Being a hard worker, during rainy season she spends all of her time taking care of the household.  She has been raising crops for 15 years and enjoys harvest time most after all her hard work and sacrifice.  She is very friendly and talkative, and adept at crop farming, so she takes advantage of every opportunity to attend to her land since it helps take care of expenses.  In the future she wants to buy a motorcycle for transportation to her cropland. 

This is her second loan through MFP and she is committed to paying it back on time.  Her goal is to continue working responsibly to get ahead.  She plans to use the 2,000 PEN loan to buy a motorcycle for work.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma, de 40 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Jorge de 43 años y sus tres queridos hijos; Jenny de 18 años, Yutmer de 15 años y Luis de 12 años. 
Vilma, es una mujer de de trabajo le gusta estar permanente en sus campos de cultivo; desde hace 30 años empezó  a cultivar plantas de café; los padres de Vilma se sentían muy orgullosos por la manera en como su hija caminaba por la chacra viendo sus cultivo. Ahora Vilma junto a su esposo llevan una gran responsabilidad; tener que ver por sus hijos y también por la chacra que con grandes esfuerzos lograron tener. Sin embargo tiene que afrontar las dificultades que tiene con las plagas que logran dañar sus frutos de café. Por tal motivo acude a los préstamos de MFP, para solicitar un préstamo para que pueda solucionar los problemas que afectan a su producción.
Este será su crédito número 07 con MFP, se siente comprometida con la financiera, por ello, será puntual en todas las cuotas de pago. En su banco es una socia cabal.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará fertilizantes agroquímicos para que la plaga no logre afectar su cultivo.
texts.en: Vilma, 40, lives in her own house along with her husband Jorge, 43, and their three dear children: Jenny 18, Yutmer 15, and Luis 12. Vilma is a hard-working woman. She likes to be always in her farmland. Thirty years ago she began to grow coffee plants. Vilma's parents felt very proud for the way their daughter walked through the farm watching her crops. Now Vilma, along with her husband, carry a great responsibility: it has to do with her children and also with the farm that they've managed to won with great effort. Nevertheless, they have to face the difficulties that they have with the pests that have managed to damage their coffee fruits. For this reason they have gone to MFP's loans to request a loan so they can solve the problems that affect their production. This will be loan number 7 with MFP. She feels committed to the financing for which she will be punctual with all of her repayments. In her bank, she is thorough member. With the 2,000 new "soles", she will buy agrochemical fertilizers so the pests do not affect her crops.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and agrochemicals.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia, de 54 años, es una mujer amable y buena, está casada con Carlos de 60, ella tiene dos hijos a quienes educo y formo para ser personas productivas en la sociedad y ya son mayores e independientes, vive a lado de su esposo en su casa propia. El trabajo de Delia consiste en la venta de prendas de vestir, con ello obtiene buenas ganancias. Es así que se va a los pueblos y caseríos cerca de la ciudad, en donde vende o hace intercambio de prendas con los pobladores, mas le conviene hacer el intercambio, pues le dan carne, menestras, animales, entre otros, por lo que los ofrece en otro lugar, logrande tener más ganancias. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 2 años y le está yendo muy bien.
Durante sus viajes al río Pachitea que por donde mas vende le pasan muchas aventura. El haber viajado mucho y conocer tanta gente le permite tener buenas ventas que le dan con eso buenas ganancias. Desea seguir trabajando para seguir progresando y mas adelante vender más ropa, de esa manera tendrá un progreso en su negocio. Este será su crédito número 3 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo económico que le permitirá tener un incremento en su inversión. Por otro lado se compromete a seguir siendo una socia puntual para no fallar a su buen grupo ya que todos son responsables y muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas ropa para seguir con su venta, además de comprar algunos productos que le hicieron pedido en los caseríos que visita.
texts.en:
Delia, aged 54, is a kind and good woman. She is married to Carlos, aged 60, and is the mother of two children, whom she educated to become productive members of society and who are already adults and live on their own. She lives with her husband in their own house.

Delia sells clothes and earns a good income. She travels to the villages and hamlets near the city, where she sells or barters clothes. She prefers barter, because she receives meat, vegetables, animals etc., which she offers elsewhere and gets a higher profit. She has been in this business for two years and is doing very well. During her trips to the River Pachitea, where she makes her best sales, she encounters many adventures.  Having traveled so much and knowing so many people ensures good sales and earnings. She wants to continue her work in order to progress, sell more clothes and have a successful business.

This will be her third loan with the microfinance institution Microfinanzas Prisma. She is very happy to know that she can have financial support for her investments. On the other hand, she promises to be punctual with her payments and not let her fellow group members down, because they are all responsible and very supportive. She will use the 1000 new soles of her loan to buy more clothes and continue her sales. In addition, she wants to buy a few items that people have ordered when she recently visited their hamlet.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña mercedes,  de 38 años de edad,  tiene 4 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando para poder salir adelante, mientras ella se dedica a la venta de comida  desde hace 4 años, habita en la ciudad de Estelí. Anteriormente trabajo como conserje de limpieza en una empresa pero decidió poner su propio negocio donde pudiera ganar un poco mejor.  Además le ha permitido aportar con las gastos del hogar, independizarse de su esposo y ayudar a sus hijos con los estudios .
Ella solicita el préstamo para compra de aceite, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, carne, plátanos, pues   son ingredientes que utiliza para preparar su comida. Este crédito le permitirá comprar mas materia prima para trabajar  y ofrecer variedad de comida a su clientela. Uno de sus propósitos es tener un bufet de comida en un local propio y así dejar de alquilar para ahorrarse costos,  también comprar utensilios de cocina, sillas, mesas.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a 38 year old mother of four school-age children. They live in the city of Esteli where she has worked preparing food for four years. She had previously worked as a cleaning lady, but she decided to start her own business so she could earn more. Having her own business has allowed her to help cover household expenses, become more independent from her husband, and help her children with their homework. 

She is applying for a loan to purchase oil, rice, sugar, beans, meat, and plantains which are the ingredients she uses to prepare her food. This loan will allow her to buy more supplies and offer more variety to her customers. One of her goals is to own her own restaurant, so she wouldn't have to pay rent. She also hopes to buy cooking utensils, chairs, and tables.

loans.use: purchase oil, rice, beans, meat, and plantains

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Jose, de 46 años de edad, habita en Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estelí, casado , padre de dos hijos.  El es de oficio maestro de escuela primaria, y también a servicio de fotografía y filmaciones de eventos. Este negocio lo inicio por medio de un amigo que le sugirió que ofreciera sus servicios como fotógrafo se ayudara  a conseguir otros ingresos  y sus hijos pudieran estudiar. El ve la necesidad de mejorar los equipos con los que trabajan necesitan modernizarse para ofrecer un mejor servicio. El realizo el crédito para comprar  una cámara fotográfica profesional pues necesita ofrecer un buen servicio para sus clientes, ya quiere darse a conocer y promover sus servicios en eventos, bodas, bautizos , cumpleaños. Uno de sus planes es tener su propia reveladora de fotos y no ir a la ciudad de Estelí para revelar sus fotos y ahorrarse costos. Siempre seguir dando clases para poder tener ingresos que le permitan pagar la universidad a sus hijos.
texts.en: 46-year-old Jose lives in Pueblo Nuevo in Estelí municipality and is married and the father of two children. He is, by profession, a secondary school teacher and also photographs and films events. He started this business through a friend who suggested that offering his services as a photographer would help him obtain another source of income and to enable his children to study. He sees the necessity of modernizing in order to offer an improved service. He took the loan to buy a professional photography camera, since he needs to offer a good service to his clients. He already wants to become known and to promote his services for events, weddings, baptisms and birthdays. One of his plans is to have his own photo developer instead of going to the city of Estelí to develop his photos and to save costs. He always continues giving classes to be able to have the income that allows him to pay for university for his children.

loans.use: to buy a professional photography camera.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ladies' accessories

loans.name: Raul

texts.es: Raúl, de 42 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa Marcelina de 40 años y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes desea brindar lo mejor. Raúl, hace 18 años, que realiza el trabajo del cultivar de plantas de café, cuyo fruto lo considera rentable ya que los centros de acopio le remuneran buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo. Esta labor lo realiza con la ayuda de su esposa e hijos quienes le motivan a seguir trabajando para poder tener una buena estadía. Por otro lado le es difícil en los tiempos de cosecha ya que tiene que cargar los sacos desde la chacra hasta la los centros de acopio. Para mas adelante espera en aumentar su producción. Este será su crédito número 11 con MFP, , por el cual agradece a la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que brindan, es mas asegura cumplir fielmente con sus obligaciones de pago, además le va de la mejor en su banco comunal, ya que existe un clima cordial entre todos los socios. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará a jornaleros para que le apoyen con su cosecha.
texts.en:
Raúl, 42, lives in his own house with his wife, Marcelina, 40, and their three beloved children for whom they provide the best they can.  For 18 years Raúl has been cultivating coffee, considering it a profitable business because the collection centers pay a good price per kilogram.  He works with the help of his wife and children, who are his motivation for maintaining a good lifestyle.

Harvest time is difficult because of having to load the sacks and take them from the cropland to the collection centers.  In the future Raúl wants to increase production.  This is his 11th loan through MFP and he is grateful to the institution for the easy loan terms, and is committed to paying back the loan on time.  He is happy with his communal bank because of the cordial atmosphere among all the members.  He plans to use the 1,000 PEN loan to hire workers to help with the harvest.

loans.use: To hire workers.

loans.name: Yaneth

texts.es:
Yanet de 21 años de edad Convive con Brichman de 22 años de edad, fruto de esta relación tienen un hijo, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Llochegua. Yaneth es una joven madre, que dejó los estudios por dedicarse  a su menor hijo. Ahora trabaja atendiendo su propia tienda de abarrotes, ubicada en casa. Nos comenta que al inicio le fue difícil emprender el negocio, además de ver a sus demás compañeros terminar el colegio. Pero tenia que hacerle frente a todo esto y salir adelante a costa de mucho esfuerzo. Hoy trabaja sola mientras que su esposo se dedica al transporte maritimo de pasajeros con su bote en el puerto de Llochegua. Yaneth esta contenta con su negocio que tiene por que es rentable, pues gracias a ello se compró una congeladora, mas adelante esta pensando comprarse una refrigeradora ya que le es muy útil para su negocio. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. 
Ella esta contenta con su banco comunal por que son unidos. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles invertirá en la compra de mas productos.
texts.en:
21-year-old Yaneth lives with her partner Brichman who is 22.  The couple have one son.  They live together in their own home, in Llochegua district.  Yaneth is a young mother who left her studies to devote herself to her child.  She now works in her own grocery store which is located in her home.  She tells us that, at first, it was difficult to start her business, especially as she watched her friends finishing high school.  However, she had to face all this and make progress through a lot of hard work.  Yaneth works alone in her store while her husband transports passengers in his boat in Llochegua port.  Yaneth is very happy with her business because it is profitable.  Thanks to this, she was able to buy a freezer.  In the future, she is planning to buy a refrigerator as it would be very useful for her business.

This is Yaneth's first loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She is happy to belong to her community bank because it is very united.  She will invest her 1,500 soles in buying more products.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her store

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
Adrián de 31 años de edad, convive con Elizabet de 30 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Llochegua. Adrián es una buena persona, dedicado al cultivo de cacao juntamente con su querida esposa desde hace 12 años. Nos comenta además que para obtener una buena producción es necesario estar al pendiente de sus plantaciones, de su mantenimiento, y tener control.
En la parcela que tiene también cultiva una variedad de frutas con el que sustenta algunos gastos del hogar.
Usualmente Adrián trabaja con algunos peones que le facilitan en la extracción de sus productos para luego comercializarlos. Él esta contento con esta labor que realiza porque le genera una buena rentabilidad económica. Mas adelante está pensando seguir expandiendo sus cultivos con la finalidad de incrementar su producción. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que el se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles realizará el deshierbo de su campo agrícola, para ello va a contratar peones.
texts.en:
31-year-old Adrián lives with Elizabet who is 30 years old.  The couple have two children and live in their own home, in Llochegua district.  Adrián is a good person who has been growing cacao alongside his beloved wife for 12 years.  He tells us that in order to experience good production, you must keep on top of your plantations and their upkeep and keep control.  On the plot of land that Adrián has, he also grows a variety of fruit which helps him cover some household expenses.

Adrián usually works with laborers who make the picking of his products much easier.  He is happy with the work that he does because it makes him good profits.  In the future, he is planning to continue expanding his crops so that he can increase his production.  This is his second loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  Adrián will use his 2,500 soles to hire laborers to weed his land.

loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 30 años de edad, convive con su pareja y tiene 02 hijos, Jhonns de 10 años, y Yanelu  de 6 años de edad. Juntos viven en su casa  propia. La actividad que realiza Reyna, es labrar la tierra en su propia chacra que hace 15 años llego a adquirir con mucho esmero. Reyna junto a su pareja elaboran el cuidado de sus plantas de café. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver los apreciados frutos que con el tiempo le resulta  beneficioso por la manera como efectúa su producción; por otra parte considera difícil que las plagas afecten sus siembras ya que son difíciles de lidiarlas. Es por eso que acude a MFP para requerir un préstamo en cual ayude con sus objetivos de trabajo. Con el tiempo su mayor anhelo es comprar plantas de café para luego cultivar en su terreno. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, por el se compromete a pagar durante las fechas establecidas, además, se siente conforme por las buenas decisiones que toma su banco comunal. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornales para que puedan ayudarle en el desyerbo de malezas.
texts.en: Reyna, 30, lives with her common-law husband and two children, Jhonns, 10, and Yanelu, 6, in their own house.  Reyna has been farming her own land with great care for 15 years, and she and her husband are the ones who look after their coffee plantation.  What she enjoys most about her work is being able to harvest the crop which is very profitable because of the production process.  The hardest part is battling crop disease which can set in, so she is requesting a loan from MFP to help meet her goals.  Her greatest desire for the future is to buy more coffee plants for her cropland.  This is her first loan through MFP and she is committed to paying it back on time.  Also, she is in agreement with the decisions made by the communal bank.  The 2,000 PEN will be used to hire workers to help remove weeds from her land.

loans.use: To hire workers.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Andrés de 36 años de edad, es casado con Marleny de 25 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Llochegua. Andrés es un técnico electricista que viene ya trabajando en este oficio hace mas de 8 años atrás, él agradece a Dios por darle esa sabiduría de poder solucionar los problemas de cada equipo. Es por ello que él se levanta muy temprano para poder atender a sus clientes, de esta manera avanzar con los trabajos que le dejan. Usualmente trabaja con su querida esposa  en el taller que tienen, Andrés es el mas recomendado por su trabajo, porque lo realiza de manera eficiente. Es por ello que tiene un buen ingreso y clientes nunca le faltan.  Andrés está contento con esta actividad que realiza, por que le genera una  buena rentabilidad económica. Mas adelante Andrés está pensando ampliar su puesto de atención con la finalidad de que sus clientes se sientan cómodos ya que sus clientes que le visitan vienen de pueblos muy alejados y no tiene espacio donde puedan sentarse mientras es solucionado su artefacto o equipo, porque para Andrés sus clientes son importantes. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2, 500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la ampliación de su local de trabajo.
texts.en:
36-year-old Andrés is married to Marleny who is 25.  The couple have two children and live in their own home, in Llochegua district.  Andrés is an electrician who has been in this line of work for more than eight years.  He thanks God for giving him this ability to solve the problems presented by every piece of equipment.  He gets up very early in the morning to serve his customers and make progress with the jobs that they leave him.  He usually works together with his beloved wife in the workshop that they have.  Andrés is very well recommended for the work that he does because he does it efficiently.  For this reason, he receives a good income and is never short of customers.  He is happy with the work that he does because it makes him good profits.  Andrés is planning to expand his work premises so that his customers feel comfortable as they visit him from villages that are a long way away and he doesn't have space for them to sit down while he is fixing their appliance or piece of equipment.  Andrés' customers are important to him.

This is Andrés' second loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  He will invest his 2,500 soles in expanding his work premises.

loans.use: to buy building materials to expand his work premises

loans.name: Kosar's Group

texts.en:
Kosar has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will purchase a new sewing machine that will allow her to fulfill her clients' orders on time and increase her profits. She is very skillful in her work and her clients give her regular orders. She is confident that the loan investment will help her make her business more profitable.

Kosar’s husband is a rickshaw driver and provides transport services to his passengers. She has given birth to two sons and two daughters. Two of them are studying while others remain at home. Kosar is very positive-minded lady and is confident that her improved business will help her family to live a better financial life.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit lives in Aygestan village with her husband and three children. She has been growing trees and cultivating land for seven years. Through this period farming helped Anahit to create prosperous conditions for her family. 

Now Anahit wants to expand her farm and earn more income. With the requested loan she will purchase saplings and plant them. She also plans to purchase a freezer, where she will keep some part of the fruit that she gathers to sell during next winter season. 
 
This loan will help Anahit to earn additional income, which will allow her to cover the growing costs of her family and ensure financial stability for them.

loans.use: to purchase saplings to plant.

loans.name: Superacion Group

texts.es:
La señora Gregoria Mercedes es soltera, tiene 20 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educacion primaria, se dedica a la confección de sudaderos, inicio este negocio con un poco de capital y hasta el momento 6 años de experiencia, Espera en el futuro contar con un negocio grande y con operarios.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara apara la compra de telas, las mejoraran su producción de sudaderos, las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a la artesanía con barro, tejidos de sabanas, crianza de animales y a la atención de tienda en general.
texts.en:
Gregoria Mercedes is 20 years old and single.  She completed her 'educación primaria' (education for children aged 7-14) and her business is making sweatshirts.  She started this business with a small amount of capital and now has six years experience.  She hopes, in the future, to have a large business with workers.

Gregoria got together a group so that she could request a loan to buy fabrics, to improve her sweatshirt production.  The other members of the group make handicrafts from clay, weave sheets, raise animals, and run stores.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making sweatshirts

loans.name: Cornel

texts.en:
Cornel is forty-two years old, married, with three children. She runs a beauty salon to earn a living. She has been in the business for twelve years and employs three people. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to grow her business and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a machine to blow dry hair and a hair drier.

loans.use: To buy a machine to blow dry hair and a hair drier.

loans.name: Shabana's Group

texts.en:
Shabana has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will purchase a sewing machine because her current machine has become old and she is unable to meet the deadlines. She is confident that by purchasing a new sewing machine, she will be able to complete the client orders on time and increase her income.

Her husband is a master tailor and runs his tailoring business in the market. He is expert in men's clothing and his customers are very satisfied with the quality of his work.

Shabana has given birth to a son and a daughter. Both of them are studying in a nearby school. She is very hopeful about her family’s bright future.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar is twenty-nine years old. She lives with her pensioner parents. Gohar works for the local rescue service. Unfortunately, her salary is too low to cover the family's costs. So Gohar is also involved in cattle breeding. She has been running he farm for five years. Now Gohar needs some financial means to develop the farm. She plans to use this loan to purchase two cows and forage.

Gohar dreams of having a big farm. This loan gives her an opportunity to take the first steps towards making her dream come true.

loans.use: to pay for cows and forage.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is thirty-eight years old, married, with four children. He runs a matatu (van) transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business for two years and employs one person. He does farming to earn extra income. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. 

He has applied for a loan of 65,000 Kenya Shillings to buy new tires for his van.

loans.use: To buy new tires for his van.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora, de 36 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Amador de 40 años y sus 04 queridos hijos a quienes desea ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. Teodora se dedica con mucha fuerza y pasión a la actividad agrícola, especialmente al cultivo de plantas de  Café, quien  junto con su pareja labora casi todos los días, con la finalidad de llevar estabilidad económica y familiar En tiempo de sembrío y cosecha necesita el apoyo de jornaleros para que agilicen de manera eficiente. Su producto los vende a los centros de acopio de la ciudad de San Francisco, a  precios competitivos. En el futuro piensa elaborar la construcción de su casa, para que así haya mayor comodidad para su familia. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, en efecto, se compromete a cumplir fielmente con sus respectivos pagos, durante las fechas pactadas, además agradece a su grupo comunal por la confianza que lo brindan. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, le servirá para que pueda construir su casa.
texts.en: Teodora, 36, lives in her own house with her common-law husband, Amador, 40, and her four beloved children for whom she tries to provide the best lifestyle possible.  Teodora dedicates her hard work and much passion to her farming activity, especially to her coffee plantation which she and her husband care for every day in order to provide economic stability to the family.  During the planting and harvest seasons she needs to hire workers for more efficiency.  She sells her produce at competitive prices to the collection centers in the city of San Francisco.  In the future she wants to build a more comfortable house for her family.  This is her first loan through MFP and she is committed to paying it back on time.  She is grateful to the communal bank for the confidence shown in her.  She plans to use the 1,000 PEN to begin building her house.

loans.use: To buy construction materials for her house.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar de 49 años de edad casado con  Ada de 34 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 4 hijos ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Llochegua. Edgar es un buen hombre trabajador desde muy pequeño, quien se gano el aprecio de todos sus clientes gracias al buen trato que brinda  hacia ellos. Él se dedica al expendio de bebidas y comidas típicas en el bar recreo que tiene en el distrito de Llochegua.
En su negocio nunca le falto nada, siempre está apta para todo público porque cuenta con una piscina para niños y adultos, juegos mecánicos y los mas exquisitos platos típicos preparados a base de los productos de esta región que son los que dan un realce al negocio que tiene.
Los días mas concurridos son los fines de semana por lo que Edgar debe de preveer de personal y la cantidad de alimentos a preparar. Edgar esta contento con el negocio que tiene por que le genera un buen ingreso económico, mas adelante esta pensando en mejorar a un mas el recreo que tiene. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que él se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles invertirá en mejorar la infraestructura de su bar recreo.
texts.en:
49-year-old Edgar is married to Ada who is 34.  The couple have four children and live in their own home, in Llochegua district.  Edgar has been a hard worker since he was very young.  He is highly regarded by of all his customers thanks to the way he treats them.  Edgar's business is selling drinks and traditional dishes in a 'recreational bar' that he owns in Llochegua district.

Edgar has never lacked anything in his business.  It is always suitable for everybody because he has a swimming pool for children and adults, funfair rides and the most delicious dishes, prepared from regional produce, which enhances his business.  His busiest days are weekends and so he must ensure he has staff and a large amount of food to prepare.  Edgar is happy with his business because it makes him a good income.  In the future, he is planning to improve his 'recreational bar' even more.

This is Edgar's second loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  He will invest his 2,500 soles in improving his business infrastructure.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to expand his 'recreational bar'

loans.name: Nune

texts.en:
Nune is forty-five years old. She lives in Armanis village with her husband and daughter. Nune's husband works at the local factory, but the salary is too low to make ends meet. The main income for the family is cattle breeding. 

Nune has applied for this loan to develop her farm. She plans to purchase four calves and forage. With expansion of the farm, Nune hopes to earn more income, which will allow her to renovate her old house and ensure a better life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase calves and forage.

loans.name: Harun

texts.en:
Harun is thirty-nine years old, married, with two children. He sells sodas and ice cream to earn a living. He has been in the business for eight years and describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for a loan of 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sodas and a fridge to store ice cream for sale.

loans.use: To buy sodas and a fridge to store ice cream for sale.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Ramadan appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Amal is a fifty-two-year-old woman. She is a mother with two sons and one daughter. Her husband is a Palestinian National Authority employee who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and pay for the cost of improving the house.

Amal is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of improving the condition of the house. This includes painting, changing windows and doors. This will enable Amal to provide her family with better and more suitable living conditions.

loans.use: To improve the condition of the family's house.

loans.name: Karolina Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña karolina, es originaria de Estelí, es soltera tiene 3 hijos de los cuales solo una esta en la escuela ya que las  demás no tiene la edad para asistir a clase, se dedica a la venta de ropa.  Inicio el negocio ala edad de 25 años ha sido su segundo  negocio ya que anteriormente vendía elotes cosidos en la calle. Actualmente trabaja como obrera en una fabrica de tabaco, lugar donde ella vende la ropa. Ella dice que este es un negocio ha sido muy bueno ya que ha podido obtener otro ingreso mas para salir adelante con su familia.  El  préstamo lo solicito para la compra de zapatos, camisas, uniformes, colchas, sabanas entre otros artículos escolares. Este crédito me ayudara a crecer mi negocio porque podre comprar más ropa y  artículos escolares. Ella desea  poder  tener su propia tienda de mercadería en General  y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Karolina is from Estelí.  She is single and has three children only one of whom is in school as the others are not school age.  Karolina's business is selling clothing.  She started her business at the age of 25 and it was her second business because she previously sold cooked corncobs in the street.  She is currently employed as a worker in a tobacco factory, which is where she sells her clothing.  She says that her business has been very good as she has been able to make an extra income so that she can make progress together with her family.  

Karolina has requested this loan to buy shoes, shirts, uniforms, bedspreads, sheets and school supplies.  She says, "this loan will help me to grow my business because I will be able to buy more clothing and school supplies".  Karolina would like to own her own store where she could sell general merchandise.  She would also like to provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shoes, shirts, uniforms, bedspreads, sheets and school supplies

loans.name: Frida

texts.es:
Frida de 37 años de edad, madre soltera quien tiene 3 hijos, ellos viven en su  casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Llochegua. Frida es una mujer muy trabajadora, desde muy pequeña estuvo insertado en los negocios, poco tiempo después que se separÓ de su esposo empezó a dedicarse a la venta de bebidas en su propia casa con la finalidad de tener un ingreso.
Además tiene su parcela agrícola donde cultiva cacao y plátano, cuando Frida tiene que estar en sus labores agrícolas el que la remplaza con la atención de su tienda es su menor hijo, mientras que Frida es la encargada cultivar con el apoyo de algunos peones quienes le facilitan con la mano de obra a cambio de un salario.
Frida está contenta con esta labor que realiza por que gracias a sus esfuerzos ha logrado construir su vivienda en el distrito de Llochegua con la finalidad de que sus hijos puedan vivir mejor y estar cerca de su centro de estudios. Más adelante Frida está pensando incrementar su tienda con nuevos productos. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles invertirá en el incremento de mercadería.
texts.en:
37-year-old Frida is a single mother and has three children.  They live in their own home, in Llochegua district.  Frida is a very hard-working woman who has been working since she was very young.  Shortly after she separated from her husband, she started selling drinks from her home with the aim of making income.

In addition, Frida has a plot of farmland where she grows cacao and bananas.  When she has to carry out her farm work, her youngest son replaces her in the store while she farms with the support of some laborers who help her in her work in exchange for a salary.

Frida is happy with the work that she does because, thanks to her efforts, she has managed to build a home in Llochegua district so that her children can live better and be close to their school.  In the future, Frida is planning to introduce new products in her store.  This is her second loan from MFP and she pledges, once again, to make her repayments on time.  She will invest her 2,500 soles in increasing her stock.

loans.use: to buy more drinks

loans.name: Artyom

texts.en:
Artyom is a thirty-three-year-old entrepreneur from Yerevan. He lives with his wife, mother and school-age children. 

Artyom started his business six years ago. He provides car repair services. In order to complete current orders properly Artyom needs to purchase necessary equipment and parts for cars. This will allow Artyom to meet his clients' demand and provide high-quality services - which means stable development and further growth for his business. 

Artyom wants to ensure access to high education for his children in the future, and further development of business will give him such opportunity.

loans.use: to pay for equipment and parts for cars.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is fifty-seven years old, married, with three children. He does tomato farming to earn a living. He has been in the business for ten years and employs two people. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for a loan of 15,000 Kenya Shillings to buy tomato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy tomato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a thirty-seven-year-old man, he is married and has no children yet. He is an employee at a local company and a salary, but it is low and not enough to cover the family's needs.
 
Mohammad is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing necessary home furniture such as living room seats and dinning room furniture. This will create better and more comfortable home-living conditions for Mohammad and his wife.  

Mohammad is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture.

loans.name: Hermine

texts.en:
Hermine is thirty-three years old. She lives with her husband and three school-age children. Hermine has been engaged in agriculture together with her husband for eight years. Due to their hard work all through these years the couple was able to keep the growth of the farm stable and sustain their children. 

Now Hermine plans to expand her farm, for which she needs sufficient means. With the loan amount Hermine wants to purchase two cows and forage. This loan will help Hermine to increase the income from agriculture, which will help her to expand the barn and create better conditions for the cattle. Besides, additional income is vital for Hermine to cover her children's educational costs and ensure a brighter future for them.

loans.use: to buy cows and forage.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa de 44 años de edad, madre soltera con 4 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Llochegua. Rosa es una mujer emprendedora que desde muy pequeña siempre le ha gustado el negocio, con la finalidad de mantenerse con los gastos de la escuela. Cuenta que estando en tercer año de primaria su padre le hizo un cajoncito de madera en donde los lleno de caramelos, y salio a venderlos en cada feria que hubiera en el distrito de Pichari, con la finalidad de solventarse algunos gastos del colegio. Es de esta manera que ella empezó con los negocios. Actualmente cuenta con un pequeño bar recreo en donde expende bebidas como también prepara comidas típicas a base de productos de esta región y carnes exóticas.
Rosa está orgullosa con lo que hace ya que le resulta rentable, los días que más trabajo tiene son los fines de semana en donde el recreo está repleto de clientela en donde hasta le falta manos para atenderlos.
Mas adelante rosa esta pensando mejorar su local hacerla mas atractivo. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles invertirá en la mejora de su bar recreo.
texts.en:
44-year-old Rosa is a single mother with four children.  They live in their own home, in Llochegua district.  Rosa is an entrepreneurial woman who has always enjoyed working in business since she was very young.  This helped her to cover her school expenses.  Rosa tells us that when she was in her third year of elementary school, her father made her a small wooden box which she filled with candies and then went out to sell them in every market in Pichari district so that she could cover some of her school expenses.  This is how she started off in business.  Rosa currently has a small 'recreational bar' where she sells drinks and traditional dishes prepared with regional produce and fine meats.

Ros is proud of what she does as it is profitable.  Her busiest days are weekends when her bar is full of customers.  Sometimes she doesn't have enough hands to serve them all.

Rosa is planning to improve her premises and make them more attractive.  This is her second loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She will invest her 2,500 soles in improving her 'recreational bar'.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to expand her business

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Racheal is sixty-one years old, married, with four children. She sells mangoes to earn a living. She has been in the business for four years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able educate her children and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for a loan of 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy mangoes to sell.

loans.use: To buy mangoes to sell.

loans.name: Gegham

texts.en:
Gegham is forty-eight years old. He lives with his wife and son. For many years Gegham has been engaged in cattle breeding, which helped him to sustain the family. His farm consists of two cows at present. 

Gegham has applied for this loan to purchase one more cow. This will help Gegham to earn more income from agriculture and create more prosperous living conditions for his wife and son.

loans.use: to pay for a cow.

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en:
Dominic is thirty years old, married, with one child. He does photography to earn a living. He has been in the business for four years and employs two people. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business and hopes to expand further in the future. He has applied for a loan of 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy two digital cameras and a photo-washing machine.

loans.use: To buy two digital cameras and a photo-washing machine.

loans.name: Chhun

texts.en:
Chhun is fifty-six years old, a mother of seven children, living in Baray district of Kompong Tom province. She is in the same business as her husband; both are local rice cultivators. Normally she grows her rice crops twice a year because she can get enough water from the nearby river, which flows through the province. 

Presently Chhun is preparing the soil to start growing her dry-season rice, however she doesn’t have sufficient capital to buy farming materials for it. So now she would like to request a loan from Kiva, though HKL to purchase seeds, fertilizers and some pesticides to keep her crops in a good condition and thus have a good harvest this year. This loan will contribute to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and some pesticides.

loans.name: Zoila Rosa

texts.es:
La Señora. Zoila es socia del banco comunal Las Flores, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, reconocida por la belleza de su Centro Histórico, los 4 ríos que la bañan, su gastronomía y la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Zoila nos comenta que se encuentra muy bien en su salud al igual que toda su familia. Se dedica a la venta de frutas tropicales actividad que la desempeña hace 25 años ya que es un negocio tradicional de su familia.
 
El dinero de su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de frutas y en el pago de su crédito no tuvo ninguna dificultad  en la cancelación del mismo. Fue de mucha ayuda ya que con las ganancias que obtuvo pudo mejorar la situación de su familia. 
 
Su nuevo crédito también lo va a invertir en frutas y también para el arreglo de su local para tener una mejor presentación. El banco comunal le gusta por el compañerismo del grupo.

Su sueño es comprarse un auto.
texts.en:
Zoila is a member of 'Las Flores' community bank.  She lives in the city of Cuenca which is a World Heritage Site.  This city is well known for the beauty of its historic center, the four rivers that surround it, its cuisine, and the culture and tradition of its villages.

Zoila tells us that she and her family are enjoying very good health.  Her business is selling tropical fruit.  She has been in this business for 25 years as it is a business in which her family has traditionally worked.
